data.name: Fairy Fencer F: Weapon Change Accessory Set
data.detailed_description:
Fairy Fencer F: Weapon Change Accessory Set includes Weapon Change Accessory Sets Little Black, Green, Icons, Little Purple, Purple, Reaper, Little White, and Yellow.

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Little Black
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Black Star, Black Moon, Black Sun

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Green
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Green Ring α, Green Ring β, Green Ring γ

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Icons
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
C's Pouch, I's Cell Phone Case, F's Memo Pad

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Little Purple
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Purple Star, Purple Moon, Purple Sun

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Purple
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Purple Ring - Bamboo, Purple Ring - Paper Fan, Purple Ring - Blade, Purple Jewel - Bamboo, Purple Jewel - Paper Fan, Purple Jewel - Blade

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Reaper
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Reaper's Charm - Crystal, Reaper's Charm - Darkness, Reaper's Charm - Steel

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Little White
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
White Star, White Moon, White Sun

Weapon Change Accessory Set - Yellow
A collection of accessories that can change the appearance of your weapon!
The following items will be added:
Yellow Seed - Tiger, Yellow Seed - Panda, Yellow Seed - Machine

data.short_description: Fairy Fencer F: Weapon Change Accessory Set includes Weapon Change Accessory Sets Little Black, Green, Icons, Little Purple, Purple, Reaper, Little White, and Yellow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
